scripts.restart:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.restart:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.db:backup: docker exec -t postgres_db pg_dump -U strapi -d strapi > database_backup.sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i postgres_db psql -U strapi -d strapi < database_backup.sql
